DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Material Layer Set
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a material layer set, consisting of a set of material layers with thickness and material name that defines the material of the _element_construction.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Material Layer Usage
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of the assignment of a material layer set to the _element_reference axis or reference plane (with an offset). The alignment and thickness of the material layer set has to be consistent along the axis or parallel to the plane.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Material List
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation:
Provision of a list of material name that defines the different materials of the _element_construction.
NOTE: There is no correspondence of the parts or components of the _element_construction and the materials within the material list.
DEPRECATION: The Material List will be deprecated in IFC4.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Single Material
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of a single material name that defines the material of the _element_construction.
